entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EmptyView of CarouselView isn't displayed on Android #13069
  • Cursor is trapped in text field during fast text copying/text input. #13064
  • [iOS] Differences in Grid row height between platforms #13062
  • Maui Slider Thumb Issue #13061
  • Weird files in VS4Mac solution explorer #13060
  • [iOS] CollectionView SelectedItem not working #13059
  • [Windows] CarouselView Layout is broken #13057
  • [Windows] Selected CollectionView VisualState not working #13056
  • [Android] CarouselView loses Snap behavior using Loop and setting spacing #13053
  • Hot Reload does not work or stops working in some specific cases #13052
  • Hot Reload Performance #13051
  • Wrong XAML error messages using Hot Reload #13050
  • [Windows] `WindowOverlay.DisableUITouchEventPassthrough` does not work #13049
  • Consider making IsPointerOver property public #13046
  • Maui app softlock #13044

Closed

  • Windows app gets a unknown win32 error on exit #7317
    Backlog
  • Impossible to add the background gradients feature on ContentPage iOS #11714
    Backlog
  • RadioButton with an inline content definition doesn't display it properly on Android #6614
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] ScrollView scroll bar is misplaced after window resize #9349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Tab key doesn't move between Entry fields on Mac Catalyst #8473
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Creating new Content View items populates the wrong "xmlns" paths(?) #13055
  • Background is not recognized or is not accessible - breaks XAML Hot Reload #10696
    Backlog
  • App does not register on default build #13007
  • A DllNotFoundException is thrown when calling into an iOS binding library when using MAUI on iOS #13039
  • BindableProperty OneWay Event not working. #13042

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Download build warning #13067
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Fix DotNetCoreTestSettings.Logger build warning #13068
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Merge main into net8.0 #13065
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove obsoleted OpenGLView #12579
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Windows apps do not need GUIDs (drop GUIDs) #13032
    area/single project ☝️, area/templates 📄
  • Bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/main@8872d04 34.0.0-preview.1.146 #13040
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.13.2 to 0.13.3 #13048
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Simplify hardcoded array of C# keywords in CodeBehindGenerator #12195
    community ✨
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 #13017
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12799
  • Fix dotnet format workflows #13018
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • `main` into `net8.0` #13035

Updated

  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Try resolve the dotnet build crash on macos #12954
    do-not-merge
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • fix: Fixed nullable annotations for WeakEventManager. #12950
    community ✨
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️
  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix issue with caching the page that holds unfocused control #13028
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2 #12686
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
